message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $13,000. I believe this product will be highly valuable to you, and this offer represents a great opportunity to acquire it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe it's a bit higher than I'm willing to pay, considering the value I've seen in similar products.

Bob, thanks for your interest. While I understand your perspective, the value of this product to you is significant, and $9,000 is considerably below what I'm willing to accept. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $11,500. I'd like to propose a compromise at $10,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
